findings.title: RSML - Redundant SafeMath Library
findings.description: The usage of the SafeMath library adds complexity and overhead, increasing gas consumption unnecessarily.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity style guide, which can affect readability and maintainability.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: The contract may have missing events that can cause issues with its arithmetic.

findings.title: L09 - Dead Code Elimination
findings.description: The contract has dead code, which can increase the size of the contract and deployment costs.

findings.title: L15 - Local Scope Variable Shadowing
findings.description: Local variables with the same name as outer variables can cause confusion and unintended consequences.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on user-supplied input without proper checks, which can lead to problems.
